title: Vaguely Optima like... Anybody have any history / background on this type of face?
content:
Hey Guys,  
I'm really interested in this humanist Optima like typeface. Any ideas what it is, as well as some background on this particular type of face? Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016195053im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_6724.png)
author: michaelwasiak
